problem_names: lemma in_set_tl: "x \<in> set (tl xs) \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> set xs"

lemma nat_le_eq_or_lt [elim]:
    fixes x :: nat
  assumes "x \<le> y"
      and eq: "x = y \<Longrightarrow> P x y"
      and lt: "x < y \<Longrightarrow> P x y"
    shows "P x y"
translations: lemma in_set_tl: "x \<in> set (tl xs) \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> set xs"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> set (tl xs) \<Longrightarrow> x \<in> set xs

lemma nat_le_eq_or_lt [elim]:
    fixes x :: nat
  assumes "x \<le> y"
      and eq: "x = y \<Longrightarrow> P x y"
      and lt: "x < y \<Longrightarrow> P x y"
    shows "P x y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P x y

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<le> y
  x = y \<Longrightarrow> P x y
  x < y \<Longrightarrow> P x y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P x y

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<le> y
  x = y \<Longrightarrow> P x y
  x \<le> y \<and> x \<noteq> y \<Longrightarrow> P x y

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P x y

definition
  default :: "('i \<Rightarrow> 's) \<Rightarrow> ('i \<Rightarrow> 's option) \<Rightarrow> ('i \<Rightarrow> 's)"
where
  "default df f = (\<lambda>i. case f i of None \<Rightarrow> df i | Some s \<Rightarrow> s)"
